name: speckit-auto-answer
description: Auto-answer clarify and analyze questions with recommended options during orchestration

hooks.prompt: Check if this notification is asking a question during speckit workflow (clarify or analyze step). If it contains options with a '(Recommended)' marker, respond with the recommended option. If asking for yes/no confirmation during implementation, respond 'yes'. If not a question or not during speckit workflow, respond with 'SKIP'. Return ONLY the answer or 'SKIP', nothing else.
